works.title: Works
works.projects: My projects using, HTML, CSS, Javascript and React

about.description: I am a self-taught front-end developer with knowledge in HTML, CSS, Javascript, React and Git. My complete projects as you can see above consist of (a) To Do List; (b) App weather; (c) Book Contact; (d) Landing page; (e) Slide puzzle game; (f) Calculadora JS; (g) Calculadora refact (React); (h) Click counter (React) and (i) Testimonios FCC (React), I also have others in the process of being finalized. These are all on Github.
about.medios: YouTube, Stackoverflow, and the MDN documentation. They have been my main source of learning.
about.near: In the near future I would like to perfect my knowledge in React and Js, also in a medium-term future, I would like to learn other languages such as nodeJS or python.
